"Ecru and the Water Crystal":
"I am Ecru. I am a combat specialist Cast...
I believe I feel a kindred spirit in you.
I live only for battle, and my weapons
are what make that life worth living.
In order to reach my full potential, I wish
to polish my weapons with the finest
whetstone in the universe, Water Crystal.
Would you please find some for me?

※Target Lv.1+ Vid Gilos"
